hero.desc1: Just a few steps from Gerupuk Bay Beach
hero.desc2: Private Villa for 6-11 Guests with Pool & Ocean Views

amenities.desc: Offering access to an outdoor pool, shared lounge, and shared kitchen. The villa features a private pool, garden, BBQ facilities, free WiFi, and free private parking.
amenities.title: Amenities
amenities.subtitle: Everything you need for a comfortable and luxurious stay

rooms.desc: The villa features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views.
rooms.title: Rooms & Suites
rooms.subtitle: Three uniquely designed suites, each offering its own perspective

butler.title: Dedicated Butler
butler.desc: From arranging surf lessons in Gerupuk Bay to organizing a sunset BBQ, our team anticipates your needs before you even ask.

chef.title: Private Chef
chef.desc: Savor the flavors of Lombok with personalized menus sourced from local markets and fisherman, prepared in your private kitchen.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: A visual journey through Villa Utamaro

testimonials.title: Guest Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: What our guests say about their experience

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Villa Utamaro

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Find us in the heart of Gerupuk, Lombok
location.desc: Located in Blumbang, just a few steps from Gerupuk Bay Beach. Car rental service is available at the villa for your convenience.
location.addressContent:
Jalan Pantai Lombok Tengah
Gerupuk, Central Lombok
West Nusa Tenggara 83573, Indonesia
location.airportDesc:
Lombok International Airport: 22 km
Narmada Temple: 48 km

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out through any of these channels.

footer.desc: Zen Retreat by the Shore. Experience harmony between minimalist Japanese architecture and the waves of Lombok.
